textBeforeTable: Table 122-1 DBMS_XDB_VERSION Package Subprograms Summary of DBMS_XDB_VERSION Subprograms Oracle XML DB Developer's Guide See Also: Summary of DBMS_XDB_VERSION Subprograms This chapter contains the following topic: Oracle XML DB versioning APIs are found in the DBMS_XBD_VERSION package. Functions and procedures of DBMS_XDB_VERSION help to create a VCR and manage the versions in the version history. 122 DBMS_XDB_VERSION 129/206 Skip Headers-->
textAfterTable: CHECKIN Function This function checks in a checked-out VCR and returns the resource id of the newly-created version. Syntax  DBMS_XDB_VERSION.CHECKIN( pathname VARCHAR2) RETURN DBMS_XDB.resid_type; Parameters Table 122-2 CHECKIN Function Parameters Parameter Description pathname The path name of the checked-out resource. Usage Notes This is not an auto-commit SQL operation. CHECKIN Function doesn't have to take the same path name that was passed to CHECKOUT Procedure operation. However, the CHECKIN Function path name and the CHECKOUT Procedure path name must be of the same resource for the operations to function correctly. If the resource has been renamed, the new name must be used to CHECKIN Function because the old name is either invalid or is currently bound with a different resource. Exception is raised if the path name does not exist. If the path name has been changed, the new path name must be used to CHECKIN Function the resource. CHECKOUT Procedure This procedure checks out a VCR before updating or deleting it. Syntax
